Control Statement: The organization: (a)   Authorizes the execution of privileged commands and access to security-relevant information via remote access only for [Assignment: organization-defined needs]; and (b)   Documents the rationale for such access in the security plan for the information system.Supplemental Guidance:  Related control: AC-6.
